description:
Touyama Megumi was Arifuji Misuzu`s best friend. She was the one who actually told Misuzu about "Panuru" and his philosophy of acceptance.
She was killed by the serial killer 5 years ago, and the shock of finding her body in Kitaguchi Park led to Misuzu`s eventual separation from reality.
name: Touyama Megumi
